oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Effect of all organic or field organic feeding on milk omega-3 and omega-6 milk fatty acid concentration
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kuusela, Eeva
Uusitalo, Elina
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Feeding and growth
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In conclusions, certified organic milk from organic farms had favorable omega FA composition than milk from farms practicing only organic field farming and giving more concentrates. Relatively high milk ALA proportions suggested positive effect of red clover in both farm groups.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Kuusela, Eeva and Uusitalo, Elina (2010) Effect of all organic or field organic feeding on milk omega-3 and omega-6 milk fatty acid concentration. Paper at: IX Finnish symposium on plant science, Joensuu, Finland, May 17-19, 2010.
